Package com.flag4j.core

Class SparseMatrixBase<T>

java.lang.Object
com.flag4j.core.TensorBase<T>
com.flag4j.core.MatrixBase<T>
com.flag4j.core.SparseMatrixBase<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
SparseCMatrix, SparseMatrix
public abstract class SparseMatrixBase<T> extends MatrixBase<T>
Base class for all sparse matrices.

  • Constructor Details

    • SparseMatrixBase

      public SparseMatrixBase​(Shape shape, int nonZeroEntries, T entries, int[] rowIndices, int[] colIndices)
      Creates a sparse matrix with specified size, non-zero entries, and row/column indices.
      Parameters:
      shape - Shape of this sparse matrix.
      nonZeroEntries - Number of non-zero entries in the sparse matrix.
      entries - Non-zero entries of this sparse tensor.
      rowIndices - The row indices of all non-zero entries.
      colIndices - The column indices of all non-zero entries.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the number of non-zero entries, row indices, and column indices are not all equal.

  • Method Details
